a.title: Federal Programs Every Student Succeeds Act
a.span: Federal Programs Every Student Succeeds Act

li.a: Federal Programs Every Student Succeeds Act

p.span: NOTICE: Due to the Governor’s mandate to mitigate COVID-19, THE FOLLOWING BOARD OF EDUCATION MEETINGS MAY BE VIEWED VIA CAPE GIRARDEAU PUBLIC SCHOOLS FACEBOOK LIVE. A recording will be available on YouTube. Go to www.capetigers.com for the link.
SPECIAL WORK SESSION: Monday, April 27, 2020 – 5:15 PM

IMPORTANT COVID-19 UPDATE: Our schools remain closed as a precaution. MEALS WILL BE PROVIDED TO ALL CHILDREN 18-UNDER AT OUR ELEMENTARY SCHOOLS FROM 10AM - NOON, MONDAY- THURSDAY, WITH DOUBLE MEALS ON THURSDAY.

Central Administrative Office is open Tuesdays and Thursdays 8AM-1PM. You can also email tigerhelp@capetigers.com with any family/student support requests.
Please stay informed on the latest regarding Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) by frequently visiting the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention website.
Find familiar online educational resources for your students:
Help us rebrand by taking a few minutes of your time to fill out this survey!

The
2020-2021 Academic Calendar is available for families to view.
Breakfast and lunch will be FREE for all students during the 2019-2020 school year.

hr.p: EARLY DISMISSAL WEDNESDAYS - Each Wednesday, our schools dismiss early for staff instructional collaboration. Dismissal times are: Elementary-2:30, CMS-2:35, CJHS-2:05, CHS-2:00, CA-1:50.
